# add subdirectories

add_subdirectory(
	"libImGUI"
	"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/extern/libImGUI"	
)

add_subdirectory(
	"libSDL2"
	"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/extern/libSDL2"
)

#	"libBoost"
#	"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/extern/libBoost"
#)

add_subdirectory(
	"libSDLImage"
	"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/extern/libSDLImage"
)
